pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, November 18, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, November 18, 2016:

Buenos Aires, Argentina

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Parque de la Memoria. 

Parque de la Memoria
Buenos Aires, Argentina

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Pooled coverage of certain elements of the program


12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a luncheon given by the Argentina-Canada Chamber of Commerce and will participate in a moderated discussion.

Sala de Vendas, Main Floor
Yacht Club Puerto Madero
Buenos Aires, Argentina

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart Buenos Aires for Lima, Peru


Lima, Peru

9:10 p.m. The Prime Minster will arrive in Lima, Peru.

Jorge Ch√°vez International Airport
Lima, Peru

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


Note: all times local


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
